title: Make all the runes 100 IP
body:
Riot I think it is time to make all the runes 100 IP each or free. There is no reason to have to grind for runes. It make the game so stupid when you get a team mate that has no runes and gets shit on because of it. You have over 120 champ that people grind for no reason for the runes also. 

I have spent over 150k on runes and I dont care if you make them all free make the game fare for these new players

replies.body: I'm pretty sure I saw a thread about the cost of runes. Saw some math that said buying all tier 3 runes was about 150k
It could be a lot more than that. It is just silly that they cost that much.
Okay, would they refund all the IP already spent?
Plus, people that have played the game for a while are asking for another IP sink

But tbh, runes aren't the good way for IP sink. They are expensive for new players and it's hard to play without runes against a player with runes, since a player with runes will have bigger damage that you early and take less damage from you if he has resistance runes.

Imo, Riot should add something to Hextech Crafting for purpose of IP sinking. Maybe give the option to buy keys for some obscene amounts of IP, just, I don't know.
Let them buy key fragments/chest fragments for a good bit of ip

IP sink should be something cosmetic. Not something that gives you an advantage. I think chest and keys should be purchasable for IP, but at a much higher ratio to RP than champs cost. For example, 3000 IP for a chest/key. This way, you have a purpose for your IP once you own all champs and runes. I currently need to buy 21 champs before I hit the point where my IP becomes obsolete. It'll take me a while to get there, but if I keep playing, I think I'll get there by season 7 (wow, season 3 still looks like yesterday).
Yes, please - if runes really decrease in cost, I'll be asking (demanding) a refund.
just be glad it would finally be fair. don't be one of those obnoxious little children demanding more after they finally come to help..

"Fair"? I've been grinding hard to be able to afford all my 20 filled runepages...
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/eune/37320309#runes

If they wanted to help, they could've done so 2 years ago.

You're choice to go way overboard...every time riot tries to do something that they think we will all like they're greeted by immature losers that just want to cry about how they didn't get what they wanted..you know what happens then? They stop being nice and continue on as usual making a consistly larger profit than normal because they don't give away as much. With the hextech boxes, people are crying about how they can never get key fragments. But they forget they're getting things for free still...

_"Your"; not you're._

Well, because of the bug about getting Hextech key fragments on any map other than SR, I really can't get any such things.
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/eune/37320309#matches

And I actually liked the Draven heads joke. And I don't want U.R.F. back.

So if you want to talk about immature, look at all the April's fools raging.

And as for the Hextech system (referring to Hextech Annie), I calculated it would take some 12000 RP to get that by purchasing chests.
And what was that number of years estimated to get it through free chests? 4 years or something?

It's still free, aye, but the time required... Much the same as with runes.

I've spent 150k IP on runes (tier 3 only), and I don't have them all yet.

My rune chart:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/lpgrve05m2n6e2t/Runes.jpg?dl=0

Rune rewards for champion mastery? 1 random primary rune per mastery levels 2 and 3 per champ.

130-ish champs x 2 (for 2 Mastery levels) = 260. Number of Tier 3 primary runes: 29 x 9 = 261.

Another idea is to make them available for Blue Essence. Only problem with that is the higher chance for bad rolls since Runes are in the spinner now.

Maybe add an option to change champ shards into runes? With a cost? 2 for a rune? Idk.

The game has no real Content, no money sinks at all, thanks to RP (or waiting a month) reliant hextech. If runes are made dirt cheap or free, its taking the only IP sink other than champions out of the game. What about people who own all champions? Unless rito adds a way to waste IP, other than buying new champions, a large number of people will have thousands, if not hundreds of thousands of saved up ip, for nothing. Playing the game for no sense of progression whatsoever.
~~That's what you get for buying all the champs with RP~~

> [{quoted}](name=Sleeper Cell,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-04-03T13:38:03.328+0000)
>
> ~~That's what you get for buying all the champs with RP~~

Account from 2010, when I started playing the game I was in college, spent a good 4-5 games a day everyday (lots of free time).   So yeah really old account, lots of IP, not much to do with it. I guess I should but more runes pages but half of the time I don't use more than 2 or 3 sets of runes anyway

I am in that same camp - didn't signup until 2013, but I still got 20 filled runepages, and plenty of spare IP.
I don't yet have every champion (don't much care for them), but subtracting the number of IP the last 16 champs would cost me, and I'm - at the time of writing - left with 105199 IP.

So here's the question, as I've been giving it some thought myself, what would be an acceptable IP sink?
Personally, I'd like something simple. Something so simple, it could very well be an icon, say, at the price of 100.000 IP, saying "100K IP".

Or an icon made like a puzzle, with 16 pieces, each piece costing a set amount, say, 12500 IP, and at the end receiving a special icon, recognizing the amount spent in some way.

I've been suggesting skins being purchasable with IP too, but at a reasonable amount, ofc. Such as 20x the RP cost.
1820 RP = 36400 IP, and so on.

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=0003000000010000,timestamp=2016-04-03T19:36:24.130+0000)
>
> I am in that same camp - didn't signup until 2013, but I still got 20 filled runepages, and plenty of IP.
> I don't yet have every champion (don't much care for them), but subtracting the number of IP the last 16 would cost me, and I'm left with 105199 IP.
> 
> So here's the question, as I've been giving it some thought myself, what would be an acceptable IP sink?
> Personally, I'd like something simple. Something so simple, it could very well be an icon, say, at the price of 100.000 IP, saying "100K IP".
> 
> Or an icon made like a puzzle, with 16 pieces, each piece costing a set amount, say, 12500 IP, and at the end receiving a special icon, recognizing the amount spent in some way.
> 
> I've been suggesting skins being purchasable with IP too, but at a reasonable amount, ofc. Such as 20x the RP cost.
> 1820 RP = 36400 IP, and so on.

If they ever give you content out of IP that can be bought with RP I'm guessing it will force you to have all the possible IP bough content first (all champions, runes pages adn rune themselves) Afterwards I'm guessing they will keep the same conversion ratio they have for some of special summoners Icon which is 250 RP = 1500 IP

If they would force us to own every rune, then they'd have to make every rune viable in some way.
Mainly thinking of the Quintessences Revival and Experience here. And when was the last time anyone saw the Gold per 5 and Lifesteal runes? It feels like those last two are sooo season 4.

And I won't believe for a second they'd stick to the multiplier of 6 - that would make a 1820 RP skin purchased with IP cost 10920 IP. And secondly, they're not consistently sticking with that conversion ratio on anything.
975 RP = 6300 IP, not 5850 IP (RP x 6).

Oh i meant for the guy i was replying to. I'm a 2010 player too with -almost- all the champs. Missing the star dragon.

But then again i have so many niche runes and 20 rune pages all with IP so there's that haha.

I'm close to the "need an IP sink" struggle. Not quite yet tho.

> [{quoted}](name=Sleeper Cell,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-04-03T13:38:03.328+0000)
>
> ~~That's what you get for buying all the champs with RP~~

I'm able to cash maybe $10 every 3ish months, Try buying champs with IP <3
Only time I spend RP on champs is if I have enough left over after buying skins and I have enough to buy an on sale champ then I'll just buy it.

Runes are not meant to be an IP sink. Not in any stretch of the imagination is that a logical statement. That would be like saying Champions are an IP sink; it makes absolutely no sense. Runes are only there to increase the grind and serve no other real purpose than just being another thing you HAVE to buy rather than buying champions for personal enjoyment.

No sense of progression? Are you Rank 1 in NA? I highly doubt it. Thats what ranked is for, it is a almost literally never ending grind of improving yourself to get higher on the ladder. (Though for me personally the value of that position is essentially zero with DynamicQ at the moment). Also theres champion mastery which is a fun little minigame you can do by getting Mastery 5 on all champions. If you are playing League of Legends for progression after playing it for so long rather than enjoyment, perhaps its time you uninstalled.
You could make keys and boxes available for IP, but for a large amount.

> [{quoted}](name=bill84,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=00030003,timestamp=2016-04-03T20:31:57.413+0000)
>
> You could make keys and boxes available for IP, but for a large amount.

That is exactly right, if rito did that, they'd have a lot happier playerbase.

> [{quoted}](name=Deiformis Ira,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-04-03T12:31:15.141+0000)
>
> The game has no real Content, no money sinks at all, thanks to RP (or waiting a month) reliant hextech. If runes are made dirt cheap or free, its taking the only IP sink other than champions out of the game. What about people who own all champions? Unless rito adds a way to waste IP, other than buying new champions, a large number of people will have thousands, if not hundreds of thousands of saved up ip, for nothing. Playing the game for no sense of progression whatsoever.

not every one plays all day or has played for years. There are way more people who are still grinding ip for champions than there are people who have every ip item unlocked.

> [{quoted}](name=UberPbat,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=00030004,timestamp=2016-04-03T21:27:08.453+0000)
>
> not every one plays all day or has played for years. There are way more people who are still grinding ip for champions than there are people who have every ip item unlocked.

There are a LOT of people who have though. It comes down to, you cant please everyone, so they chose to not please anyone. I agree runes arent a great IP sink, but its one of the only ones currently in the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Deiformis Ira,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=000300040000,timestamp=2016-04-03T22:30:54.950+0000)
>
> There are a LOT of people who have though. It comes down to, you cant please everyone, so they chose to not please anyone. I agree runes arent a great IP sink, but its one of the only ones currently in the game.

You highly overestimate how many people there are like that. I've played since early 2012. I still have a good 40 champions left to buy because I bought so many runes (I'm not one of those people who say 2-3 runepages are enough). I have many other friends like that as well. I have like a single friend that owns all the champions. Don't get insulted when I say this, but most people don't commit *that* much time to the game. Making League more friendly to newcomers won't hurt.

> [{quoted}](name=DracoMTA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=0003000400000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T09:16:07.383+0000)
>
> You highly overestimate how many people there are like that. I've played since early 2012. I still have a good 40 champions left to buy because I bought so many runes (I'm not one of those people who say 2-3 runepages are enough). I have many other friends like that as well. I have like a single friend that owns all the champions. Don't get insulted when I say this, but most people don't commit *that* much time to the game. Making League more friendly to newcomers won't hurt.

And I've been playing for around 5 months, and only need about 15 more champions, have 2 full runepages, and have only gotten 4/5 champs with RP.

> [{quoted}](name=Deiformis Ira,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=00030004000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T18:53:21.324+0000)
>
> And I've been playing for around 5 months, and only need about 15 more champions, have 2 full runepages, and *have only gotten champs with RP.*

That there is your problem m8. I have money, but I don't use it to buy something that's better unlocked with effort.

> [{quoted}](name=DracoMTA,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=000300040000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T19:29:26.171+0000)
>
> That there is your problem m8. I have money, but I don't use it to buy something that's better unlocked with effort.

I actually typo'd hardcore. xD I meant to type, i've only gotten 4-5 with rp, and 3 of those were gifts. In my financial situation, I cant afford to cash. I do agree that it is very dumb to buy all champions with RP, its a waste.

> [{quoted}](name=Deiformis Ira,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=0003000400000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-04-04T20:56:06.478+0000)
>
> I actually typo'd hardcore. xD I meant to type, i've only gotten 4-5 with rp, and 3 of those were gifts. In my financial situation, I cant afford to cash. I do agree that it is very dumb to buy all champions with RP, its a waste.

I see. Understandable, nonetheless, I stand by my point. The majority of people who play league don't have the time to play enough to unlock everything or aren't willing to do so.
this isn't a progression game
Dont even bother with runes, the are pretty useless.
lol

runes should be free/unlocked automatically especially when you're level 30 playing ranked. Or just remove it completely. Been playing for 3.5 years now and i haven't gotten all the champions yet and barely enough runes to actually create a diverse amount of rune page.
the dream is to customize runes while in champ select (i stopped playing in my first account when {{champion:127}}  was released but i think that it was possible at that time)
Then what are we supposed to do when we have 150k IP or more.
be happy? There shouldn't be infinite ways to pressure players with IP just because some weirdos play this game so much they can afford literally anything

Pretty ridiculous how some Tier 3 Non-Quintessence Runes are 820 IP. We usually get like around 40-80 IP per match depending on performance and win/loss.

So... what, that's like 11-22 games to get a single rune that, by itself, has negligible power attached to it?

Please. I just leveled an account 30 and I had JUST ENOUGH IP TO BUY ONE RUNE PAGE. 

I STILL HAVE TO BUY 14 OTHER CHAMPIONS.

I own all the champions I want to play and it's still hard to buy Runes, because I save up to unlock each new champion and i'm trying to save up for a name-change with IP.

Honestly please just fucking turn on IP for old Ward Skins or something to draw the cost out of the Rune System
**Finally an interesting request, this would make games more balanced.**
Riot would never do it because the cost of Runes is specifically there to increase the already absolutely insane grind.
It's not necessarily a grind but a pressure to convert free players into paying customers

> [{quoted}](name=aliceandsven,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2016-04-04T00:50:52.382+0000)
>
> It's not necessarily a grind but a pressure to convert free players into paying customers

A set of 3 of quite a few types of quintessences costs 6300 ip. 3 runes cost as much as the most expensive champions in the game. Many of my runepages (excluding the runepage itself) cost 17,000 ip. Enough for two 6300s and a 4800 champion. Assuming a game takes 30 minutes and gives 100 ip, the fastest you can earn 17,000 is in 77 hours of nonstop gameplay. Spacing it out for just first wins of the day can reduce that up to 2.5 times, down to around 30.6 hours of gameplay over 61 days.

Of course, 100 ip is extremely generous, and basically assumes a win every game with 40+ minutes of play despite the games being 30 minutes. It also neglects queue times and champ select. The overall time spent to earn a runepage full of runes becomes ridiculous in generous conditions, let alone real life conditions.

That's 61 days, or 77 hours straight under perfect conditions to even the gameplay for a few champions. The time investment required to play the game on an equal level with others is definitely over the top.

> [{quoted}](name=KillnYall,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-04-03T03:24:25.025+0000)
>
> Riot I think it is time to make all the runes 100 IP each or free. There is no reason to have to grind for runes. It make the game so stupid when you get a team mate that has no runes and gets shit on because of it. You have over 120 champ that people grind for no reason for the runes also. 
> 
> I have spent over 150k on runes and I dont care if you make them all free make the game fare for these new players

I have been playing since beta.  I have all the champions, 15 rune pages and I am missing 40 other types of Runes.

And I have a **ridiculous amount of game played** in normals, dominion, Ascension(when available), Doombots(when available), Urf(when available), Snowdown(when available) and ARAM.

Proof of runes:  http://na.op.gg/summoner/rune/userName=psi21

Now unless you spent a Ton of money on champions or went more crazy on the number of games played by a factor of X 2.... 

You sir are lying.

Edit your oldest post was about a little over a year ago...  looks like you went down the money route.  
Should that be a pride factor to look up to you?
Playing the game does not require you to post on the forums. I'm the same way, except I don't play the game enough to have all the champs or that many runes.

> [{quoted}](name=Equinoxian Lord,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Fa1fQAev,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2016-04-03T17:12:07.268+0000)
>
> Playing the game does not require you to post on the forums. I'm the same way, except I don't play the game enough to have all the champs or that many runes.

Gaming history has him starting a little over a year ago.  

But from the posting in this thread it looks like we have the gaming republican millennials.

so please .. in all means and in true Trump fashion... lets honor the 'rich kid' who bought all the champions and rune pages and is most likely lying about having "all types" of runes.
